紙.definition: paper (CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]); classifier for documents, letters etc

紙上談兵.definition: lit. military tactics on paper (idiom); fig. theoretical discussion that is worse than useless in practice; armchair strategist; idle theorizing; cf Zhao Kuo 趙括|赵括[Zhao4 Kuo4] leading an army of 400,000 to total annihilation at battle of Changping 長平之戰|长平之战[Chang2 ping2 zhi1 Zhan4] in 260 BC

紙人.definition: human figure made of paper or papier-mâché

紙人紙馬.definition: paper dolls for ritual use in the shape of people or animals

紙包不住火.definition: lit. paper can't wrap fire; fig. the truth will out

紙包飲品.definition: juice box; drink in a carton; Tetra Pak drink

紙型.definition: paper matrix in which type is set

紙媒.definition: print media; (old) paper taper used to light a cigarette etc

紙巾.definition: paper towel; napkin; facial tissue; CL:張|张[zhang1],包[bao1]

紙帶.definition: paper tape; ticker tape; paper streamer

紙幣.definition: bank notes; paper currency; CL:張|张[zhang1]

紙樣.definition: paper pattern as model in dressmaking; paper patten

紙火鍋.definition: paper hot pot (hot pot using a single-use pot made of Japanese washi paper with a special coating to prevent burning and leaking, used for cooking at the dining table)

紙煤兒.definition: paper taper used to light cigarette etc

紙片.definition: a piece, scrap or fragment of paper

紙短情長.definition: (idiom) a piece of paper is too short to convey my feelings

紙醉金迷.definition: lit. dazzling with paper and gold (idiom); fig. indulging in a life of luxury

紙錠.definition: paper ingots (burned as offerings to the dead)

紙錢.definition: ritual money made of paper burnt for the Gods or the dead

紙馬.definition: paper dolls for ritual use in the shape of people or animals

紙馬兒.definition: erhua variant of 紙馬|纸马[zhi3 ma3]

紙黃金.definition: gold contract; special drawing right (SDR); paper gold (finance)
